summary: A new look plus added amenities for the sanctuary.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Dawnstar Sanctuary Overhaul:
[/u]by k4tonic

As the title suggests, this is an overhaul for the Dawnstar Sanctuary. Added a new area off to the side of the main entry way that includes a blacksmith forge, smelter, grindstone, tanning rack and workbench, as well as a chest for storage. There's also an Arcane Enchanter at the top of one of the stair cases.

But that's not all... The lighting has also been redone. Each light source puts out its own light, and has been made to look a bit more appropriate taking into account the type of light and where it's located. Candles on tables put out less light than chandeliers and other larger light sources.

[i]Are there any incompatible mods?

[/i]Any mod that alters the Dawnstar Sanctuary is most likely incompatible. Also this overhaul was created for a RealVision ENB/ELFX combination in mind. Other setups will produce different results, and may not be desirable.

Note: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10510/?]Additional Dark Brotherhood Members[/url] by [b]icestormganon[/b] is compatible with this overhaul.

[i]What's new?

[/i][b]3.22.2015[/b] - v1: Initial Release

[i]Planning any updates?[/i]

Maybe add a Dark Brotherhood face sculptor. I've already experimented with this but ran into some issues. Not sure if it's the script or something else. May also add some vendors.

[i]How do I install this mod?

[/i]Download using NMM and install. I've never used Mod Organizer so I'm not sure how it functions, and I never recommend manually installing a mod unless required.

[i]I don't like this, how do I get rid of it?

[/i]Once again, NMM is your best friend here.

[i]Can I use this for my own projects, or upload to another site?

[/i]Um, no. I prefer the Nexus Sites, and a lot of time went into getting everything right.

[i]Who all is responsible for this mod?

[/i]Bethesda for the game and Creation Kit


[b]That's it, enjoy your new Dawnstar Sanctuary![/b]
author: k4tonic
